item.title: Z21 Project: Mirror App
item.description:
Z21 Project: Mirror App

Z21 worked with Mirror App Inc. to design and deliver a lightweight app for team performance. Z21 surfaced the centrality of effective behaviors and importance of context in delivering meaningful guidance for sustained team performance.

item.title: Z21 Services
item.description:
Z21 Services

Z21 offers Lean Product Management On Demand with services that draw from Strategy Consulting, Design Thinking, Improv, and Agile in support of:

item.title: An entrepreneur, design thinking coach, and product executive, Rishi has led many "zero to one" projects.
item.description:
An entrepreneur, design thinking coach, and product executive, Rishi has led many "zero to one" projects.   

Accolades for his team’s work have included: an invitation to the White House, an app store feature by Apple, a cover page story in SF Business Times, People’s Choice Award at IxDA annual conference in 2014 and many more.
